definition: to hook/to sew/to crochet/hook/check mark or tick/window catch
erhua variant of 魚鉤|鱼钩[yu2 gou1]

sentences.english: At last he struck to settle the hook.
sentences.chinese: 最后他猛拉钓丝把鱼钩给稳住了。

sentences.english: Then I sold him a medium fishhook.
sentences.chinese: 然后我卖了他一个中等鱼钩。

sentences.english: I can reach him with the gaff and eat him here in comfort.
sentences.chinese: 我可以用鱼钩把它钓过来，在这儿舒舒服服地吃。

sentences.english: Angle at any time as fish are often swimming at the place out of your expectation.
sentences.chinese: 要随时撒下鱼钩，鱼儿常在你最料想不到的地方游动。

sentences.english: I caught the edge of her frown like a fishhook.
sentences.chinese: 我看见她眉头皱得像只鱼钩。

sentences.english: Dogs eat the darndest things. From fish hooks to spoons, MY DOG ATE WHAT?
sentences.chinese: 狗狗最爱胡乱地把东西吞下，包括从鱼钩到汤匙。

sentences.english: He is baiting the fish hook with bait made from earthworms.
sentences.chinese: 他在鱼钩上挂上用蚯蚓制成的鱼食做诱饵。

sentences.english: A small one took the hook on his stern line.
sentences.chinese: 一条小金枪鱼咬住了他艉缆上的鱼钩。

sentences.english: The bigger ones get hooked with a special gaff.
sentences.chinese: 大鱼就用特制的鱼钩钩住。

sentences.english: Some enthusiasts of the sport say that results in longer, smoother casts.
sentences.chinese: 一些运动爱好者说，这使鱼钩可以抛得更远更顺利。

sentences.english: Xiao Zhang uses bait to attract big fish.
sentences.chinese: 小张在鱼钩上插上香饵，想要钓条大鱼。

sentences.english: The body is then raised either partially or completely from the ground by especially modified fishing hooks.
sentences.chinese: 人体被改造的特制鱼钩吊起，一部分或整体离开地面。

sentences.english: Your fishing-rod is ready to use after this dialog.
sentences.chinese: 在对话框之后，你的鱼钩就可以使用了。

sentences.english: Stainless steel fishhooks of superB quality easily catch fish.
sentences.chinese: 不锈钢鱼钩，超高品质，引鱼上钩。

sentences.english: And the hook Uncle took the hook, and strive to dump out the meters, have far.
sentences.chinese: 叔叔拿起鱼钩，奋力甩了出去，一下就有二三十米远。

sentences.english: I am ready for a bait, it will be hanging on a hook.
sentences.chinese: 我准备好了鱼饵，将它吊在了鱼钩上。

definition: variant of 魚鉤|鱼钩[yu2 gou1]
to fish with a hook and bait
